overview: When it comes to the ways of lust, Alexa Rae's got more than her fair share of secrets. And since she's also got the most wicked imagination imaginable, she chooses to be the centerpiece of her very nasty fantasies. Fantasies that can no longer remain mere daydreams. So check out Alexa's Wicked Wishes...because they're about to become reality!
tagline: Reflections on the life of a sex therapist.
title: Wicked Wishes
